channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Here’s when Vital Farms predicts it will be selling more eggs
item.description: The company will continue to invest in brands and supply-chain capabilities as it targets $1 billion in sales by 2027.

item.title: OpenAI just released GPT-4.5 and says it is its biggest and best chat model yet
item.description: OpenAI has just released GPT-4.5, a new version of its flagship large language model. The company claims it is its biggest and best model for all-roun...

item.title: Industry observers say GPT-4.5 is an “odd” model, question its price
item.description: Industry leaders find GPT 4.5 an interesting mix of capable model without pushing the boundaries of LLMs too much.

item.title: Super Micro is back in compliance. Is that enough to make its stock a buy?
item.description: A Mizuho analyst has brought back his coverage of Super Micro shares — but declines to recommend them, citing competitive challenges.

item.title: Nomagic raises $44M to scale European picking robot deployments

item.title: OpenAI releases ‘largest, most knowledgable’ model GPT-4.5 with reduced hallucinations and high API price
item.description: GPT-4.5 API pricing appears shockingly high, costing developers $75 and $180 for 1 million tokens in and out, respectively.

item.title: Semantic understanding, not just vectors: How Intuit’s data architecture powers agentic AI with measurable ROI

item.title: People are worried about their jobs. Here’s why that matters for stocks and bonds.
item.description: Low credit spreads aren’t reflecting rising concerns about Trump policies or the economy.

item.title: PlayerUnknown Productions reveals trailer for emergent open-world survival game
